name: Make Awesome
description:
AIE 2022 DECEMBER GAME JAM ENTRY

A first-person, movement shooter where you're small, you go fast, and shoot things to make them awesome. Wall run, mine jump, and hop around a giant kitchen and use your Make Awesome Gun to fill in and finalise the assets in the scene, from blockout to textured. Be sure to cleanse any corrupted, glitchy assets that might appear in the scene, as they can easily spread across the level and revert your progress!

Instructions

You are a little guy and your goal is to go fast and make the greybox level AWESOME!!

Use your primary fire to shoot the greybox objects in the level to turn them into their final models! Use your double jump, jumping mine and wall running abilities to traverse the kitchen! 

Over time objects in the level will become "corrupted" and indicated with an outline, if you fail to shoot it, it will explode and unawesome objects in a radius! So go fast!

Move - WASD

Jump - Space (space again to double jump!) 

Slide/Crouch - Left Ctrl

Primary Fire (Make Awesome button) - Left Mouse Click

Secondary Fire (Jumping Mine) - Right Mouse Click
   - Aim at your feet and shoot a mine to blast jump around the level! 

Wall Running - Against  a wall  + Space
   - As you approach a wall hold down Space to Wall run
